content: नंदिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [नंद्-इन्] Joy, pleasure, delight; कौसल्यानदिवर्धनः. --दिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} Of Śiva. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of an attendant of Śiva. {@--4@} Gambling, gaming; ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense). {@--5@} The speaker of a prelude or benediction (in a drama.)
